DOC.brief_title: High Intensity Non-Invasive Positive Pressure Ventilation ( HINPPV )
DOC.detailed_description: The High Intensity Non-invasive Positive Pressure trial single arm interventional study . The purpose study evaluate effect High Intensity Non-invasive ventilation ( HINPPV ) stable Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary patient chronically elevated carbon dioxide level . Participants undergo various test ( ABGs , PFTs , PSGs , 6 minute walk test ) 3 month period determine type therapy improve daytime carbon dioxide level . The participant also complete quality life questionnaire help ascertain improvement daily living activity .
